name: Gangplank
title: The Saltwater Scourge
lore: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take itâ€”and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.

role-desc: Specialists are a diverse group of champions who do not "fit into a neat little box" in regards to other class/subclass specifications. Specialists exhibit "zone control" either as a dominant or secondary attribute.

p-desc: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

q-desc: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

w-desc: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

e-desc: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

r-desc: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
